pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 31, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, August 31, 2016:

Beijing, People’s Republic of China

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the official welcoming ceremony in Beijing, People’s Republic of China

East Plaza Entrance, Ground Floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the People’s Republic of China

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Premier of the People’s Republic of China will attend a signing ceremony

Hebei Room, 1st Floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

11:35 a.m. The Prime Minister and Premier of the People’s Republic of China will hold a joint media availability

Taiwan Room, 1st Floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Open for Coverage

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the People’s Republic of China

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity 

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
